channel.title: Traverser, Fellowship 2e, Rust Hulks: Gauntlet Podcast
channel.description:
![gauntlet-logo-v6|500x500, 50%](upload://69hpYexZMJnNVGugcooN4dFJn5H.jpeg) On the new Gauntlet Podcast, hosts @swordqueen and @Auzumel_S talk with @RichRogers about Traverser, Fellowship 2e, and Rust Hulks. They discuss in-depth Rich's "Star Wars Saturdays," a project to run as many different games as possible in the SWU. Good stuff.
If you play on the Gauntlet you have a project or Kickstarter, give us a heads up a month or two beforehand. We'd love to use the podcast to support more Gauntlet Community members.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/traverser-fellowship-2e-rust-hulks

item.title: Traverser, Fellowship 2e, Rust Hulks: Gauntlet Podcast

item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

gauntlet-logo-v6600×600 160 KB

On the new Gauntlet Podcast, hosts @swordqueen and @Auzumel_S talk with @RichRogers about Traverser, Fellowship 2e, and Rust Hulks. They discuss in-depth Rich’s “Star Wars Saturdays,” a project to run as many different games as possible in the SWU. Good stuff.

If you play on the Gauntlet you have a project or Kickstarter, give us a heads up a month or two beforehand. We’d love to use the podcast to support more Gauntlet Community members.

https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/traverser-fellowship-2e-rust-hulks
